sentence.Network_en: But I found the saving exasperatingly slow.
sentence.Network_cn: 但是我发现这么节约慢得令人恼怒.

sentence.Network_en: Goertz found the IRA exasperatingly amateur.
sentence.Network_cn: 戈尔兹发现爱尔兰共和国军非常缺乏实战经验.

sentence.Network_en: He became exasperatingly capricious and exacting.
sentence.Network_cn: 他变得任性而又难以讨好,真叫人恼火.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 我想问下生气有多少个英语单词？_爱问知识人 ... dudgeon n. 生气,不高兴 exasperatingly ad. 令人生气 irate a. 发怒的,生气的.
什么意思_英语exasperating在线翻译... ... exasperated 激怒的；恼火的 exasperatingly 令人生气地 exasperate 恶化；使恼怒；激怒.

list.abs: 慢_百度百科 ... 慢条斯理[ slowly and methodically] 慢吞吞[ irritatingly slow;exasperatingly slow] 慢行[ walk].
exasperatingly difficult to handle or circumvent ., 非常难以解决或者回避.

auth_sentence.content: Their progress was exasperatingly slow, but we were beyond exasperation.
